TopicTitle: Not really a bug, just something that I find kind of.. odd..

Articles.Content:
"Yay! I finally managed to land a probe on the Mun! Soon, I'll be able to send my first manned mission!

I wonder what contracts I can get, so that I can raise the money that I will need?"

[http://imgur.com/07X3H0W](http://imgur.com/07X3H0W)

![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T23:01:51Z" title="05/03/2015 11:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Third\_OfFive**
I think you need to take a look at [imgur.com](imgur.com)
What's the name of your stranded Kerbal? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> What's the name of your stranded Kerbal? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, that's not really the issue. What I find odd is that I haven't even put someone on the Mun yet, and yet I'm already getting contracts to go rescue astronauts from the Mun.

Yeah it can happen, you don't have to do that contact though, you can decline it or leave it, and something better may take its place ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yeah it can happen, you don't have to do that contact though, you can decline it or leave it, and something better may take its place ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I know. I just wanted to point this out to the developers, so that they could perhaps change it in the future.
